title: New Interactive Mosaic Uses NASA Imagery to Show Mars in Vivid Detail
summary: Both scientists and the public can navigate a new global image of the Red Planet that was made at Caltech using data from NASA’s Mars Reconnaissance Orbiter.

title: Updated space safety document outlines rules of the road for avoiding collisions
summary: An updated version of a space safety document endorsed by more than two dozen organizations includes “rules of the road” for avoiding collisions between space objects.

title: Apple executive Doug Beck tapped to lead the Defense Innovation Unit
summary: Apple executive Doug Beck has been named as the next director of the Defense Innovation Unit (DIU), the Defense Department announced April 4.

title: NASA TV Coverage Set for Crew to Move Soyuz Space Station Location
summary: NASA will provide live coverage as three crew members aboard the International Space Station take a short trip inside the Soyuz MS-23 beginning at 4:15 a.m. EDT on Thursday, April 6, to relocate the spacecraft from one parking place to another.

title: Virgin Orbit COO calls out company leadership for failures in goodbye memo. Read the full email
summary: With Virgin Orbit now under bankruptcy protection, departing Chief Operating Officer Tony Gingiss had some choice words for the company’s leadership, as well as a lengthy and detailed apology to its employees.
